app.title: Meitu
app.description:
Meitu is a free All-in-one photo and video editor on mobile, which gives you everything you need to create awesome edits. 

Meitu Features:

„ÄêPhoto Editor„Äë
Make your photos stunning and sensational! Whatever your beauty preference, do it all with Meitu!

‚Ä¢ 200+ Filters: No more dull photos! Animate and liven them up with 200+ original effects, and let the new AI flash feature adjust for vintage aesthetics.
‚Ä¢ AI Art Effects: Cutting-edge tech that automatically turns your portraits into stunning illustrations!
‚Ä¢ Instant Beautification: Select the beautification level of your choice and get flawless skin, defined muscles, fuller lips, whiter teeth, etc., in just one tap!

‚Ä¢ Editing Features
- Mosaic: Cover anything that you want to hide
- Magic Brush: Doodle over your images with different brush options
- Remover: Easily erase unwanted objects from your photos using AI
- Add-ons: Customize your pictures by adding frames, text, and stickers
- Collage: Combine photos into one collage using in-app templates, text, and layout options

‚Ä¢ Retouch Features
- Skin: Smooth, firm, and tweak your skin color exactly how you want!
- Blemishes: Get rid of any unwanted acne, dark circles, and other imperfections with ease.
- Makeup: Experiment with eyelashes, lipstick, contour, and more to highlight your beauty.
- Body Shape: Shape your body to be curvier, slimmer, more muscular, or taller, with background locked.

‚Ä¢ Artificial Intelligence
With groundbreaking AI technology, Meitu automatically detects your facial features and adds cute motion stickers or hand-drawn effects to your face in real time while you take selfies.

„ÄêVideo Editor„Äë
‚Ä¢Editing: Create and edit videos effortlessly, add filters, special fonts, stickers, and music. Make your Vlogs and TikTok videos at a high-end level.
‚Ä¢ Retouch: Adjust your portrait with a variety of effects, from makeup and skin firming to body adjustments.

„ÄêMeitu VIP„Äë
‚Ä¢ Meitu VIP can enjoy 1000+ materials!
All VIP members enjoy free to use the exclusive stickers, filters, AR cameras, stylish makeups, and other materials. (Except special materials from partners)

‚Ä¢ Unlock VIP exclusive functions
Experience the Meitu VIP functions instantly, including teeth correction, hair bangs adjustment, wrinkle removal, eye retouch, and more. Meitu delivers a richer, better photo editing experience just for you.

Privacy Policy: https://pro.meitu.com/xiuxiu/agreements/global-privacy-policy.html?lang=en
Contact us: global.support@meitu.com

reviews.text: My absolutely favorite photo editing app! It has all the features you could need! The beauty features are pretty darn amazing as well. I have minimal complaints (could we make it so all stickers download at once instead of going page by page to download sets?) and even pay the $2.50 every... 6 months? It's such a great app!!

Absolutely love this app! Best I've tried by far! Only thing is I'm a little confused when repairing image and at the beginning it states "Upload Video To The Cloud For Better Video Experience". Do you have your own "cloud" because all my stuff automatically saves to Google Photos and the "Cloud". One more thing is why when the image repairer is uploading does it always get stuck on 30% for what seems like forever before it continues. Other than that I think it's great!

I'm so old I remember when nothing in this app was behind a paywall. I don't use Meitu often but every time I come to edit a picture, yet another filter/sticker/brush that was once free is behind a RIDICULOUS paywall. I'd happily get VIP if it was a one-time purchase, Meitu has the best filters and extras for editing photos, but at some point eventually everything but the bare-basics are going to be subscription dependent. Really, really disappointing & will never be worth $9.99/month üôÑ

So I got this for the anime ai filter and I have to say it did not disappoint. There are a few hiccups I noticed but they aren't entirely a big deal. It has trouble with more than two people, which is understandable. The only other problem with it is that it has trouble with different skin tones and short hair (usually turning short haired girls, like myself, into dudes or making the hair long.) Not huge problems and it is one of the best filters out there especially for free.
reviews.replyText: Hello, Thank you for you feedback and your precious advice. So glad to hear you are loving our new AI function ! We will pass your advice to the product leader and thank you for making Meitu a better app !

reviews.text: Invasive ads, loud autoplay ads, ad banners everywhere. They even make you watch an ad just for opening the settings! update: no, running excessive and INVASIVE ads isnt ok. There are ways to run ads without causing inconveniences to the user. I will not support a membership for an app that blocks my whole screen and takes over my audio every few minutes.
reviews.replyText:
Thank you for reaching out!
As we work to improve the product, running some ads will help us tremendously deliver the best services as soon as possible! If you‚Äôd prefer to edit without interruptions, you can always join our VIP membership.

reviews.text: The only issues I've had with it is it glitching out and doesn't processing my video, aswell as it blurring my video instead of adding HD to it. I know how the HD works, as it just blends out all the pixels, but when I'm working with the dimmer videos it just looks foggy and blurry. I've also noticed that the coloring completely changes and I have to tune the temperature to the cooler side for it to look natural.
reviews.replyText:
We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please make sure you have the latest version of the app.
If it still doesn't work, please report it by giving us a description and attach a screenshot to the following location:
Setting (Top right corner of Meitu's main menu) üëâ Help & Feedback.
So, our technical team can fix it. Thank you!

reviews.text: I honestly really love this app, so much that after yrs of using it I decided to buy the year vip subscription. I am a content creator so I like to use it to edit my videos and fix my make up & add sound effects; lately when I try to edit content it freezes and crashes. I've cleared cache, reinstalled and still have the issue. I emailed support and got no response. Now I feel I wasted my money, I am so disappointed. I guess fixing my makeup in videos and editing my photos is still worth it..
reviews.replyText: Hello, we apologize for any inconvenience caused and the absense of responses from the support üòî. Pleas kindly provide details of your problem to „ÄêAPPüëâMe (bottom of the homepage)üëâHelp & FeedbacküëâFeedback„Äë, and we will report it to our engineering team for resolution. We'll respond to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding üôè

reviews.text: I have been a fan and using Meitu for years now. It is my favorite go to for photo editing and making pictures. I really like the new additions to the beauty editing. Really cool and easy to create some awesome photos. Thank you This was a few months ago. Now this app is causing all kinds of viruses and pop ups. I hate it now. I smashed one phone completely before I realized it wasn't the phone it was this app. Fix it y'all.. dang..

The latest update removed the "Clear Sky" AI art filter, which was my favorite one. Please fix this and add it back! Without that filter, I feel no need to continue my VIP subscription. I would also appreciate the option to choose my original 3 AI art filters, rather than it be locked to those 3 terrible choices straight up. Edit: CLEAR SKY is back! Yay!
reviews.replyText:
Thank you for your use and suggestions.
The AI art function has been upgraded and will not return to the previous version for now.
We will pass on your comments to the relevant departments and also try our best to optimize the experience process of this feature. Sorry for the inconvenience, thank you!

reviews.text: There's a lot to love about this app, but unfortunately the best parts are either behind an expensive paywall or a severely limited. There is a limit on how many photos you can run through the HD Image feature even with paid subscription. Second issue is I have to "transfer" my membership between devices (phone to tablet then back to phone). Same account, just different devices. Again this is with a paid subscription.

1.„ÄêFlash„Äë&„ÄêLow-Light Fix„Äëare now available in Photo Edit. Adding retro Gen Z flash vibes while saving shadowy shots like a pro.
2. „ÄêHair Highlighs„ÄëTry chestnut, pink & trending shades!
app.AIReview:
Overview

Meitu is a mobile photography and video editing application aiming to provide an accessible, all-in-one solution for users seeking instant enhancements to their photos and videos. With over 116 million installs and a robust rating of 4.5583563 based on 1.3 million user reviews, Meitu has clearly established itself as a popular choice within the photography app market. The app's core promise ‚Äì ‚Äúcreate awesome edits‚Äù - leverages trendy visual effects and AI-powered tools to transform standard photos into what Meitu deems ‚Äústunning and sensational‚Äù images. The application is free to download and use, relying on in-app purchases for premium features and filters. This review will delve into the app‚Äôs functionality, usability, strengths, weaknesses, and ultimately assess its value proposition for potential users.

Key Features

Meitu's feature set centers around several core categories designed to cater to a broad range of editing needs:

  • Photo Editor: This is arguably the heart of Meitu. It offers extensive capabilities including:
    • 200+ Filters: A significant collection of filters, including both traditional effects and AI-powered options like the "AI flash feature" designed specifically to emulate vintage aesthetics. Users can apply these filters with a single tap, providing immediate visual transformations.
    • AI Art Effects & Summary: AI Retouch & Photo Enhance: This section utilizes artificial intelligence to automatically improve photos. The ‚ÄúAI Retouch‚Äù function performs tasks like skin smoothing and blemish removal, while the "Photo Enhance" feature adjusts brightness, contrast, and saturation ‚Äì ostensibly for a more polished look.
    • Beauty Effects: A suite of beauty tools including face reshaping, eye enlargement, lip plump, nose slimming and chin shaping are available allowing users to dramatically alter their appearance within the photo.
    • Stickers & Emojis: A wide selection of animated stickers and emojis are included for adding fun and expressive elements to photos and videos.
  • Video Editor: Meitu includes basic video editing tools, allowing users to trim clips, add music, text overlays, and apply filters directly to their video recordings.
  • Collage Maker: The app facilitates the creation of photo collages with various layout options and customizable borders.

Strengths

Several factors contribute to Meitu‚Äôs popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The application is remarkably user-friendly, particularly for beginners. The intuitive interface and one-tap filter application make it simple for users without extensive editing experience to achieve impressive results.
  • AI Capabilities: The AI-powered features ‚Äì specifically the ‚ÄúAI Retouch‚Äù and "Photo Enhance" tools ‚Äì represent a significant strength. They automate tedious tasks like skin smoothing, offering a quick and effective way to improve photo quality without requiring manual adjustments. The automatic portrait transformations are surprisingly good, often producing aesthetically pleasing results.
  • Large Filter Library: The 200+ filter selection provides users with a vast range of creative options, catering to diverse tastes and photographic styles.
  • Viral Appeal: Meitu's filters and effects have contributed to its widespread popularity on social media platforms like Instagram and TikTok, driving organic user acquisition.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Meitu has areas needing attention:

  • Over-Processing & Artificial Look: The heavy reliance on AI can sometimes lead to an overly processed or artificial look in the final images, particularly when applying certain filters aggressively. This can detract from the natural appearance of the original photo.
  • Limited Manual Control: While ease of use is a strength, experienced photographers may find the lack of granular manual control frustrating. Options for precise adjustments beyond the pre-set filter parameters are limited.
  • Performance Issues (Potential): Given the complexity of the AI processing, there‚Äôs potential for performance issues on older or lower-end devices. Some users have reported lag and slow rendering times ‚Äì particularly when utilizing multiple filters simultaneously.
  • Subscription Model Pressure: While the base app is free, the aggressive push towards premium features via in-app purchases can feel intrusive and potentially discourage casual users.

User Experience

The user experience within Meitu is generally positive, especially for first-time users. The onboarding process is smooth, guiding users through the basic functionalities with clear tutorials. Navigation is intuitive, with filters and effects readily accessible through a well-organized interface. However, the sheer volume of options can occasionally feel overwhelming, particularly when exploring the filter library. A more streamlined organization system or search functionality could improve discoverability. The app‚Äôs responsiveness needs improvement ‚Äì as mentioned above, AI processing can lead to occasional lag, interrupting the editing flow.

Value for Money

As a free application with in-app purchases, Meitu offers considerable value for casual users. The core features ‚Äì including filters and basic photo enhancement tools ‚Äì are sufficient for creating visually appealing photos for social media sharing. However, unlocking the full potential of Meitu requires investing in premium filters and effects, which can quickly add up. The pricing strategy ‚Äì with bundles offering discounts ‚Äì could be more transparent and less reliant on pushing users towards expensive purchases.

Conclusion

Meitu is a powerful and accessible mobile photo editing app that has successfully tapped into the trend of AI-powered enhancements. Its intuitive interface, vast filter library, and effective AI tools make it an excellent choice for beginners and casual photographers who want to quickly transform their photos. While some users may find its processing style overly aggressive or desire more manual control, Meitu‚Äôs strengths outweigh its weaknesses, particularly considering the app's free accessibility. Ultimately, Meitu delivers on its promise of creating ‚Äústunning and sensational‚Äù images, solidifying its position as a leading player in the competitive mobile photography space. The continued success will depend on addressing performance issues and refining its premium offerings to provide a more balanced user experience.
